name: Lies and Seductions
description:
Lies and Seductions is a game about seduction, lies, betrayal, and tragedy. The gameplay focuses on social interaction with in-game characters. Information and dirty little secrets are gathered through discussion, gossip and eavesdropping to be able to lure your way and into the heart of a rock star.

Features:

  • four seducible characters
  • flirt, mislead, eavesdrop, and pump information
  • persuade characters to reach your goal
  • play Texas hold’em poker
  • dance to impress
  • non-player characters forms opinions based on your choices they perceive
  • three different endings

(The game is from 2009)
